[[File:VeterinaryFlag.gif|thumb]]
__TOC__
==Description==
The [[Veterinary]] skill is used when a player uses [[bandages]] for [[Healing|healing]] and targets a pet. The [[Veterinary]] and [[Animal Lore]] [[:Category:Skills|skills]] work together to determine how much damage is healed. A character can only heal targets that are standing on an adjacent tile. Taking damage while using a bandage will reduce the overall amount healed.

'''The minimum and maximum amount healed is calculated as follows...'''
:Min = Animal Lore/5 + Veterinary/5 + 3
:Max = Animal Lore/5 + Veterinary/2 + 10

====Requirements to Heal====
* 60 skill in both Animal Lore and Veterinary is required before a character can cure poison with bandages (80% chance to cure).
* 80 skill in both Animal Lore and Veterinary is required before a character can resurrect a dead pet(25% chance to resurrect).

====Timing====
* Healing a pet takes 5 seconds.
* Resurrecting a pet ghost takes 10 seconds.

==Recommended Leveling==
:0-50: Buy from NPC
:50-65: Heal two cows fighting each other
:65-100: Resurrect Bonded pet (Can resurrect other peoples pets)
